verses.verse: How hast thou <S%H5826>helped<s%> him that is without <S%H3581>power<s%>! How hast thou <S%H3467>saved<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> that hath <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%>!
How hast thou <S%H3289>counselled<s%> him that hath <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, And <S%H7230>plentifully<s%> <S%H3045>declared<s%> sound <S%H8454>knowledge<s%>!
To whom hast thou <S%H5046>uttered<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>? And whose <S%H5397>spirit<s%> came forth from <S%H3318>thee<s%>?
They that are <S%H7496>deceased<s%> <S%H2342>tremble<s%> Beneath the <S%H4325>waters<s%> and the inhabitants <S%H7931>thereof<s%>.
Sheol <S%H7585><s%> is <S%H6174>naked<s%> before <S%H11>God<s%>, And Abaddon hath no <S%H3682>covering<s%>.
He stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> the <S%H6828>north<s%> over empty <S%H8414>space<s%>, And <S%H8518>hangeth<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> upon <S%H1099>nothing<s%>.
He bindeth <S%H6887>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> in his thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%>; And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is not rent under <S%H1234>them<s%>.
He <S%H270>incloseth<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne<s%>, And <S%H6576>spreadeth<s%> his cloud upon <S%H6051>it<s%>.
He hath <S%H2328>described<s%> a <S%H2706>boundary<s%> upon the face of the <S%H6440>waters<s%>, Unto the <S%H8503>confines<s%> of <S%H216>light<s%> and <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
The <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7322>tremble<s%> And are <S%H8539>astonished<s%> at his <S%H1606>rebuke<s%>.
He <S%H7280>stirreth<s%> up the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with his <S%H3581>power<s%>, And by his <S%H8394>understanding<s%> he <S%H4272>smiteth<s%> through <S%H7293>Rahab<s%>.
By his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H8235>garnished<s%>; His <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H2342>pierced<s%> the <S%H1281>swift<s%> <S%H5175>serpent<s%>.

Lo <S%H7098><s%>, these are but the outskirts of his <S%H1870>ways<s%>: And how <S%H8102>small<s%> a <S%H1697>whisper<s%> do we <S%H8085>hear<s%> of <S%H7482>him<s%>! But the thunder of his <S%H1369>power<s%> who can <S%H995>understand<s%>?
